E-mail client: Can interface with email clients and Mail Merge Wizard can send email directly from LibreOffice
Online editing: Currently via free plugins ; LibreOffice Online under development

E-mail client: Microsoft Outlook ( Not included in Microsoft Office 2013 or 2016 Home & Student )
HTML editor: Microsoft SharePoint Designer . Versions after Office 2000 Premium and Developer contain Microsoft FrontPage , the full-blown web page editor . Microsoft Word can read and write HTML starting with a free special upgrade for Word 6.0
Collaborative software: Microsoft SharePoint ( Available for separate subscription )

E-mail client: OfficeSuite Mail for Windows , AquaMail for Android
